Kawas Gas Power Project

Payment Of Bonus Act-1965

Every employee receiving salary or wages upto Rs. 20,000 p.m. and engaged in any kind of work whether skilled,unskilled,managerial,supervisory etc.
is entitled to bonus for every accounting year if he has worked for at least 30 working days int that year.

Payment Of Wages Act-1936

Payment Of Gratuity Act-1972

The wage of every person employed upon in which less than 1000 persons are employed shall be paid before.
The expiry of seventh day after the last day of wage period Gratuity shall be payable
On completion of 5 year of contionous service or in case of Death or disablement
